android.title: Tetrix
android.description:
Tetrix is the addictive puzzle game that started it all, embracing our universal desire to create order out of chaos

GO THE DISTANCE IN MARATHON MODE
Create the perfect strategy and keep your lines clear with endless Tetrimino action. Choose between original Swipe and One-Touch controls in this traditional mode.

COMPETE FOR THE TOP
Show off your skills in the new Explorers Mode. Challenge yourself by increasing level.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Keep a tally of every line youâ€™ve cleared
